scripts.build:verify: pnpm build:remotes && pnpm build:shell && echo '‚úÖ All builds successful'
scripts.build:verify:remotes: pnpm build:remotes && ls -la dist/apps/auth-mfe/remoteEntry.js dist/apps/payments-mfe/remoteEntry.js && echo '‚úÖ Remote entry files exist'
scripts.kill:all: (lsof -i :4200 -i :4201 -i :4202 -t 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'nx.*serve' 2>/dev/null || true) && echo '‚úÖ All dev servers killed' || echo 'No servers running'
scripts.kill:shell: (lsof -ti :4200 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'vite.*preview.*4200' 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'rspack.*4200' 2>/dev/null || true) && echo '‚úÖ Shell server killed' || echo 'No shell server running'
scripts.kill:auth-mfe: (lsof -ti :4201 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'vite.*preview.*4201' 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'rspack.*4201' 2>/dev/null || true) && echo '‚úÖ Auth MFE server killed' || echo 'No auth-mfe server running'
scripts.kill:payments-mfe: (lsof -ti :4202 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'vite.*preview.*4202' 2>/dev/null || true) && (pkill -f 'rspack.*4202' 2>/dev/null || true) && echo '‚úÖ Payments MFE server killed' || echo 'No payments-mfe server running'
scripts.test:rspack:hmr: echo 'Start all servers with: pnpm dev:mf, then make changes to verify HMR'
scripts.clean:build: rm -rf dist && echo '‚úÖ Build output cleaned'
scripts.clean:cache: nx reset && echo '‚úÖ Nx cache cleared'
scripts.clean:all: pnpm clean:build && pnpm clean:cache && echo '‚úÖ All cleaned'
scripts.infra:start: pnpm docker:up && echo '‚úÖ Infrastructure started (PostgreSQL, Redis)'
scripts.backend:setup: pnpm db:generate && pnpm db:migrate && pnpm db:seed && echo '‚úÖ Backend setup complete'
scripts.backend:dev: pnpm infra:start && pnpm dev:api-gateway & pnpm dev:auth-service
scripts.backend:dev:all: pnpm infra:start && pnpm dev:api-gateway & pnpm dev:auth-service & pnpm dev:payments-service & pnpm dev:admin-service & pnpm dev:profile-service
scripts.backend:kill: (lsof -ti :3000 -ti :3001 -ti :3002 -ti :3003 -ti :3004 2>/dev/null | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true) && echo '‚úÖ All backend services killed' || echo 'No backend services running'
scripts.test:api:register: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/auth/register -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email":"test@example.com","password":"Test123!@#Password","name":"Test User"}' | jq . || curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/auth/register -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email":"test@example.com","password":"Test123!@#Password","name":"Test User"}'
scripts.test:api:login: curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/auth/login -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email":"test@example.com","password":"Test123!@#Password"}' | jq . || curl -X POST http://localhost:3000/api/auth/login -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"email":"test@example.com","password":"Test123!@#Password"}'
scripts.test:api:all: pnpm test:api:health && pnpm test:api:auth:health && echo '‚úÖ All health checks passed'
scripts.backend:status: echo 'Checking backend services...' && (curl -s http://localhost:3000/health > /dev/null && echo '‚úÖ API Gateway (3000): Running' || echo '‚ùå API Gateway (3000): Not running') && (curl -s http://localhost:3001/health > /dev/null && echo '‚úÖ Auth Service (3001): Running' || echo '‚ùå Auth Service (3001): Not running')
scripts.backend:logs:api-gateway: tail -f dist/apps/api-gateway/*.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No log files found. Check console output.'
scripts.backend:logs:auth-service: tail -f dist/apps/auth-service/*.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No log files found. Check console output.'
scripts.db:users: docker exec -it payments-db psql -U postgres -d payments_db -c 'SELECT id, email, name, role, "createdAt" FROM "User" ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC LIMIT 10;'
scripts.db:tokens: docker exec -it payments-db psql -U postgres -d payments_db -c 'SELECT id, "userId", "expiresAt", "createdAt" FROM "RefreshToken" ORDER BY "createdAt" DESC LIMIT 10;'
scripts.db:count: docker exec -it payments-db psql -U postgres -d payments_db -c 'SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "User") as users, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "RefreshToken") as tokens, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "Payment") as payments;'
scripts.db:roles: docker exec -it payments-db psql -U postgres -d payments_db -c 'SELECT role, COUNT(*) as count FROM "User" GROUP BY role;'
scripts.db:active-tokens: docker exec -it payments-db psql -U postgres -d payments_db -c 'SELECT COUNT(*) as active_tokens FROM "RefreshToken" WHERE "expiresAt" > NOW();'
scripts.db:query: docker exec -it payments-db psql -U postgres -d payments_db
scripts.redis:flush: docker exec -it payments-redis redis-cli FLUSHALL && echo '‚úÖ Redis cache flushed'
scripts.test:workflow:register-login: echo 'Testing complete registration ‚Üí login workflow...' && pnpm test:api:register && sleep 1 && pnpm test:api:login && echo '‚úÖ Workflow test complete'
scripts.test:workflow:full: echo 'Testing full user workflow (register ‚Üí login ‚Üí me ‚Üí refresh ‚Üí logout)...' && echo 'See manual-testing-guide.md for full workflow script'
scripts.test:security:rate-limit: echo 'Testing rate limiting (may take a moment)...' && for i in {1..105}; do curl -s http://localhost:3000/health > /dev/null && echo -n '.'; done && echo '' && echo 'Check if rate limit was triggered'
scripts.test:security:cors: curl -H 'Origin: http://localhost:4200' -H 'Access-Control-Request-Method: POST' -X OPTIONS http://localhost:3000/api/auth/login -v 2>&1 | grep -i 'access-control' || echo 'CORS headers check'
scripts.test:security:jwt: echo 'Testing JWT validation...' && curl -s http://localhost:3000/api/auth/me -H 'Authorization: Bearer invalid.token' | jq . && echo 'Should return 401'
scripts.test:performance:health: echo 'Testing health endpoint performance (100 requests)...' && time for i in {1..100}; do curl -s http://localhost:3000/health > /dev/null; done
scripts.test:performance:concurrent: echo 'Testing concurrent requests (10 parallel)...' && for i in {1..10}; do (curl -s http://localhost:3000/health > /dev/null && echo 'Request $i: OK') & done && wait && echo 'All requests completed'
scripts.env:check: echo 'Checking environment setup...' && ([ -f .env ] && echo '‚úÖ .env file exists' || echo '‚ùå .env file missing') && (docker ps | grep -q postgres && echo '‚úÖ PostgreSQL running' || echo '‚ùå PostgreSQL not running') && (docker ps | grep -q redis && echo '‚úÖ Redis running' || echo '‚ùå Redis not running')
scripts.env:validate: echo 'Validating environment variables...' && ([ -f .env ] && echo '‚úÖ .env file exists' || echo '‚ùå .env file missing') && (grep -q '^DATABASE_URL=' .env 2>/dev/null && echo '‚úÖ DATABASE_URL set' || echo '‚ùå DATABASE_URL missing') && (grep -q '^JWT_SECRET=' .env 2>/dev/null && echo '‚úÖ JWT_SECRET set' || echo '‚ùå JWT_SECRET missing') && (grep -q '^JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=' .env 2>/dev/null && echo '‚úÖ JWT_REFRESH_SECRET set' || echo '‚ùå JWT_REFRESH_SECRET missing')
scripts.clean:backend: pnpm backend:kill && pnpm docker:down && echo '‚úÖ Backend services and infrastructure stopped'
scripts.restart:backend: pnpm clean:backend && sleep 2 && pnpm infra:start && sleep 3 && echo '‚úÖ Backend infrastructure restarted'
scripts.setup:complete: echo 'üöÄ Complete setup starting...' && pnpm infra:start && sleep 3 && pnpm backend:setup && echo '‚úÖ Complete setup finished!'
scripts.test:all: echo 'üß™ Running all tests...' && pnpm env:check && pnpm backend:status && pnpm test:api:all && echo '‚úÖ All tests passed!'
